sequence.name: Standard Client Task Sequence
sequence.description: A complete task sequence for deploying a client operating system

step.name: Load all Drivers
step.action: cmd.exe /c for /f %F in ('dir /s /b /OD x:\windows\inf\oem*.inf') do drvload %%F

step.name: Update the REST API
step.description: Added C:\ in path for dll available
step.action: cmd.exe /c "%SCRIPTROOT%\sendNotif.cmd "Rebooting. This step can take up to twenty minutes before to update the status again (Installation Setup). ""

step.name: Set DHCP again to do some operation
Set Proxy
step.action: cmd.exe /c netsh winhttp set proxy proxy.hq.k.grp:80

step.name: Opt In to CEIP and WER
Set Firewall off for all profiles
step.description: Not needed in this image because firewall is disable by default
step.action: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state off

step.name: Copy %DeployRoot%\MGTGuide.pdf in C:\Nagravision\delivery
step.description: This command line copy the MGT guide document from the root of deployment share the delivery directory on client.

step.name: Upload Release "%OSDCustomerRelease%"
step.description: The customer release is read from the customsettings.ini file

step.name: Apply Network Settings
step.description: Disable, confnet script takes care now

step.name: Cleanup and reboot
step.description: It is responsible to start confnet at the end
